section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
We are a vibrant, non-governmental, non-profit, membership-based organization providing opportunities and networking to our community of 320 companies from 20 different countries. We are distinctly independent in driving our members’ agenda, and approach every challenge with a positive, can-do attitude. 
 
We represent the international business community in Finland. We take on the projects that matter to our members and run programs that lead to more business – through best practices, unique insights, VIP speakers, key introductions, and problem-solving.
